message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that has been highly regarded by previous buyers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. For this exceptional piece, I am offering it to you for $140. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you highlighting the product's quality. I'm really interested, but my budget is a bit tighter than that. I'm willing to pay $125 for it. What do you think?
